MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK10 and FK13 postcode areas of Alloa and Tillicoultry. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.14am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of grounded overhead lines close to Birkhill Cottage and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.12pm on the 2nd of February 2021.
